name: Coordinated Assault
description:
You and your pet charge your enemy, striking them for a combined 1,060 Physical damage. You and your pet's bond is then strengthened for 20 sec, causing your pet's Basic Attack to empower your next spell cast:

Wildfire Bomb: Increase the initial damage by 20%
Kill Shot: Bleed the target for 50% of Kill Shot's damage over 6 sec.
